评论详情: I've used these for years, usually cutting off the sleeves for comfort. 4 stars because the newest ones are pilling a bit.
Does feel good and fits nicely. Arrived on time.

评论概述: You guess is always on time

评论详情: Stitching isn't as nice as my other Riggs longsleeve, this one isn't as comfortable either, but still good.  Different sort of thermal pattern to this shirt, I like it.  For $18 or so it's worth the price.  Fits good even after wash and sleeves aren't too slim. Large 185 lbs 5'10.5"
Love it.  It fits great, was sold at a decent price, and feels like it will wear like iron.
Texture was great. Washed up great. Soft and warm.
This is a nice shirt, fits as expected, and comfortable.

This sixty percent Cotton and forty percent Polyester, long-sleeved Henley shirt has a pen pocket in the front. The material is kind of thick. Overall, this is a very handsome shirt.  You can wear this shirt to casual situations. It is a bit too casual for church or office environments. It’s more for office luncheons, hanging out with friends, or maybe going out to the movies.  You can wear this top with jeans and a pair of sneakers.  This top is machine wash.  I would recommend this top.

This is an amazing shirt and the quality is perfect for anyone looking for a sturdy work shirt. This is a great shirt for those looking for a flexible work shirt that’s very easy to move in and provides a sturdy feel. It fits true to size and is exactly the feeling of shirt I want while working a manual labor job. This is a great shirt and love how it feels, if you’re looking for a higher quality shirt that’ll last you a long time, this is a great option.
This shirt is very comfortable and versatile. You can wear it while doing outside work or you can wear it in a casual setting! This shirt is true to size and is made of a soft fabric. I recommend.

My sweet hubby practically lives in henley-style knit shirts from early fall to late spring - either on their own or under something else like a flannel shirt. And when he's "done" with one - assuming it's still got some semblance of shape and original color - I usually snag it for wearing on my morning walks to get in another year or so (at least) of wear. This one fits perfectly in that rotation, although from the looks of it, it may be a while before I get my hands on it because he's more than satisfied. It fits him perfectly, so it's true to size, and the olive green is a color he doesn't already have. Of course, it's machine washable - plus soft and comfy and not too heavy to fit under a shirt or jacket. Good buy!

评论概述: Warm, soft and comfortable, fits just right
评论详情: This shirt is perfect for autumn weather. It's warm and soft with a pleasant texture. It fits just right, not loose and not skin tight. Most Henley type shirts don't have a pocket. This one does, so that's a handy feature. The material is 60/40 cotton/polyester, which should wick nicely but still have a good feel. Made in El Salvador.

评论概述: Nice thick material, a little bit oversized...nice fall/winter shirt
评论详情: I like the quality of the material and construction.  It feels like it will be durable.It provides good breathability and warmth during the colder months.  This can be used as a layer as well.I'm fit, so this fits loosely around the waist for me.  It's also a bit loose everywhere else.  It's fine for what it is, I would still suggest ordering the size you normally are since the shoulder width is near perfect for me.  It's not advertised as a slim fit, so no stars off for that.

评论概述: Comfy, color is spot on and fits really well
评论详情: I really like this long sleeve shirt. It's comfortable, a nice color and fits well. Although $30 might be a bit much - however you are getting what you pay for!

评论概述: Excellent quality: Wrangler Riggs Workwear Men's Long Sleeve
评论详情: Excellent comfort and style. Well-made shirt.  Flattering and would make a nice gift. Good quality.

评论概述: Perfect middle weight Henley. I like the sleeve.
评论详情: This long sleeve Henley style shirt from Wrangler is a 60% cotton and 40% polyester blend, making it a medium weight shirt that feels quality while being breathable and durable. The front pocket has extra stitching and a pen holder for on-the-job site work. Black is not too dark or light.  (My photo does not do a good job showing the correct color.)  It can be worn out casually while still retaining classic workwear look and feel. Perfect for a base layer in fall or winter.  I am an XL and it fits correctly.  Sizing runs true to size.  It will not shrink since it is a poly/cotton blend.  I really like the sleeves and cuffs.  Very comfortable to wear and looks good.
This is a nice fitting shirt. The color is true to the photo, and there's some texture to the fabric.
